making this for only likes real chicken

because Mikayla doesn't like it doesn't

making actual pot pie you're going to
cook these in three tablespoons of
unsalted butter slow that butter melt
and then add all of the vegetables at

start cooking season it with some salt

should only take about three minutes you
can cut up some green beans and dice

that's just slightly less than two cups
so I'm going to add a tiny bit of water

want to be careful at this point because
generally speaking when you're making a
roux like this it's equal parts butter
and flour this is five tablespoons of
flour and only three tablespoons of
butter so keep stirring it and then just
cook it until the raw flour smell has
cooked off and then you know it's time
to add your liquid what I want to do
here is add my stock and stir at the

really helpful especially in the

the most important part just keep

just want to bring this to a boil make

as promised once you do this for the

the heat off because the green beans
will cook further in the oven and you
don't want to overcook either the green
beans or the chicken right so you can
ladle it immediately into these ramekins
these are eight ounce ramekins as you
can see this is pretty thick that's
exactly what you're looking for in a

guys
alrighty I'm ready to top these I have a

only need to unfold your puff pastry you

press it so it's a nice even shape don't
worry if it breaks a little bit you can
just press it back together this is a

match your ramekins with your cutter you
can also use the top of the ramekin and
trace around the ramekin
basically you just need a round that's
going to fit inside your ramekins cut
four rounds then cut an X in the center
of each round to allow the yelling to
vent while it's cooking so the puff
pastry doesn't get soggy
then you need an egg wash so just one
egg whisk it and then you can brush it
over the top gives a nice golden brown
and shiny appearance it's totally
optional you really don't need to do it
but you know it's nice and it makes them
look more beautiful I love frozen puff

product but if you wanted to make your

like that I mean if you really wanted to
you could make puff pastry but that
